effect.Name: Multiplication With Reciprocal Square Root
effect.description: Multiplication With Reciprocal Square Root - Shader multiplies colors of base and blend with each other then colors are calculated by reciprocal square root
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Multiplication With Reciprocal Square Root (Background) Shader | 1.1 (23.06.2024) */
parameter.description: Shader multiplies colors of base and blend with each other then colors are calculated by reciprocal square root

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable sets the intensity of base visibility
